casebody.data:
BEAVERCREEK TOWNE STATION, L.L.C.
v.
GREENE CTY. BD. OF REVISION 2018-0273 Supreme Court of Ohio. April 22, 2019

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On appellant's motion to stay decision pending settlement. Motion granted. The parties shall file a report on the status of the settlement negotiations for this case within 60 days.
